ProductInfo.Features:
Fully waterproof color bullet camera with a built-in design of 12pcs infrared LED suitable for both day and night-time outdoor surveillance.
1/3" SONY SUPER HAD CCD, 420 TV lines of horizontal resolution, IR distance: 10m indoor, IP 66 protection rate housing and bracket, Lens: 6.0mm @F2.0.
Low Lux: By employing high sensitivity image sensor and low noise circuit design produces 0.5 lux and signal-to-noise ratio of 50 dB.
White Balance: The wide range of Auto Wide Balance (AWB) and Auto Tracing White balance (ATW) allows the camera to  automatically adjust the tone according to the color temperature of the light source  illuminating the subject.
Back Light Compensation: Smart digitally controlled automatic BLC, ensured for use against any unusual lighting conditions.
ProductInfo.Name: Indoor Outdoor IR Infrared LEDs Mini Bullet Security Camera 420 TVL Built-in Sony Super HAD CCD Fixed Lens Wide Angle View Internal Synchronization Auto Gain Control Day Night Vision for CCTV DVR Home Office Surveillance Secure System Weatherproof DC 12V Silver (6.0mm Fixed Lens)
